entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
